question.title: Android Studio is crashing on project opening in mac
question.body:
Android studio is crashing when i open the project, following is the exception in the java plugin that i am getting on android studio

com.intellij.diagnostic.PluginException: Cannot init component state (componentName=ProjectJdkTable, componentClass=JavaAwareProjectJdkTableImpl) [Plugin: com.intellij.java]
